name: Force in Space
description:
This Assignment belongs to 'Mohammed Asiri' in Coursera (Game development and design).

Changes:

- Some Acids have strong emissions that could make you fly

- Jump booster that is inspired by Ori games. you can use it to boost your jump in any direction.

- Unity's Particles System was used to indicate strong Acid.

The implementation of the first two mechanics forced me to change the movement system provided, which took a long time to analyze and modify.
